backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a mobile banking app defining types (User, Transaction, Notification, SupportTicket), state maps, and helper functions including admin token validation and a simple hash function. Includes access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented features: admin panel login with credentials nuralom1/9040 and the full user registration/login authentication flow, each with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's purpose, covering pages, hooks, utilities, and store modules in the React frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Mobile Banking App' that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all application routes (login, home, 7 transaction pages, profile, KYC, notifications, history, admin login/dashboard) and wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementMarq: Displays a scrolling marquee banner of announcement strings with a 'Notice' label and megaphone icon.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky app header showing the NuroPay logo and user greeting, or a back button with page title, plus a notification bell with unread count badge.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: Card component displaying the user's balance in BDT with a show/hide toggle, along with account holder name and mobile number.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Home, History, Alerts, Profile) that highlights the active route and shows an unread notification badge count.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmationModa: Modal dialog that displays transaction details and a total amount for user review, with Cancel and Confirm action buttons and a loading state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that renders page content inside a container and optionally shows the BottomNav.
frontend/src/components/NotificationItem: Renders a single notification as a clickable button, visually distinguishing read vs. unread state with icons, title, body, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUpload.tsx: Photo upload component that reads a selected image file as a data URL, shows a preview with a clear option, and exposes the URL via a callback.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingScreen: Full-screen loading indicator with a spinning loader, a processing message, and animated pulsing dots shown during transaction processing.
frontend/src/components/ServiceGrid.tsx: 3-column grid of service shortcut buttons (Send Money, Recharge, etc.) that each navigate to their respective route on click.
frontend/src/components/TransactionListI: Compact list row for a single transaction showing type icon, label, recipient/provider, amount (colored by direction), and status badge.
Printable transaction receipt card displaying a gradient header, amount, status, and detail rows, with Save Slip (print) and Done buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profile, registration/login, transactions, and notifications using the canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind CSS imports, CSS custom properties for the NuroPay green theme (light/dark), and utility classes for layout, animations, and status indicators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation covering stats, transaction control, user management, transaction management, notifications, and support tickets, guarded by admin authentication.
Admin login page that validates credentials, generates and stores an admin token, and redirects to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays a sorted list of user transactions with loading skeletons and an empty state, and shows a detailed TransactionSlip when a transaction is selected.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing the user's balance, a grid of financial service shortcuts, and a header with notifications, profile, and logout actions.
frontend/src/pages/KYCPage.tsx: KYC verification form page that allows users to submit identity details and a photo, displaying status banners for approved, pending, or rejected KYC states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the NuroPay login/register page with tab switching between a login form (mobile + PIN) and a registration form, handling auth state redirects and localized error messages.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays a sorted list of user notifications with loading skeletons and an empty state, and allows marking individual notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page providing PIN change, biometric toggle, support ticket creation/viewing, and an FAQ accordion, with auth guard redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/AddMoney: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for the addMoney transaction type with provider selection and account/reference number fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/BankTran: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for the bankTransfer transaction type with bank name, account number, and routing number fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/CashOutP: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for the cashOut transaction type with mobile wallet provider selection and account number input.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/PayBillP: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for the payBill transaction type with biller selection and bill account number input.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/Recharge: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for the recharge transaction type with mobile number input and telecom operator selection.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/SavingsP: Renders a savings transaction page using TransactionPage with fields for selecting a savings plan duration and entering a purpose/note.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/SendMone: Renders a send money transaction page using TransactionPage with a single recipient mobile number field.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/Transact: Generic multi-step transaction page component handling form input, confirmation modal, processing screen, and transaction slip display with balance validation and KYC checks.
frontend/src/store/authStore.ts: Zustand store managing authentication state (userId, balance, KYC status) with localStorage session persistence and actions for login, logout, and balance/KYC updates.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuth.ts: Provides hardcoded admin credential validation and localStorage-based token management for admin authentication.
frontend/src/utils/deviceFingerprint.ts: Generates and persists a browser-based device fingerprint using navigator/screen properties hashed into a unique string stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation functions for Bangladeshi mobile numbers, PINs, and NID numbers, plus BDT currency and timestamp formatting utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom green-themed color palette using OKLCH, extended typography, border radius, box shadows, and animation keyframes for the mobile banking app.
project_state.json: Project state document describing the full feature set, architecture, design guidelines, and known issues for a Bangladeshi mobile banking app built on ICP with admin panel and KYC/transaction systems.
